author: Nathan Layne
title: 'It's just impossible': tracing contacts takes backseat as virus spreads
description: Faced with more than 70 cases of the novel coronavirus and a deadly outbreak in an assisted living community in his town, Ed Briggs is overwhelmed.
content:
RIDGEFIELD, Conn. (Reuters) - Faced with more than 70 cases of the novel coronavirus and a deadly outbreak in an assisted living community in his town, Ed Briggs is overwhelmed. 
The health director for Ridgefield, Connecticut, says there is no way that he a… [+5111 chars]
